verses.text: \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w isles|strong="H0339"\w*, unto me; and \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, ye \w people|strong="H3816"\w*, from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* me from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*; from the \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* of my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* hath he made \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And he hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* like a \w sharp|strong="H2299"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath he \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* me, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* me a \w polished|strong="H1305"\w* \w shaft|strong="H2671"\w*; in his \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* hath he \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* me;
And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Thou \add art\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, in whom I will be \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w*.

Then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w laboured|strong="H3021"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*, I have \w spent|strong="H3615"\w* my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* for \w nought|strong="H8414"\w*, and in \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: \add yet\add* \w surely|strong="H0403"\w* my \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add is\add* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and my \w work|strong="H6468"\w* with my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 49.4 \ft my work: or, my reward\f*

¶ And now, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* me from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* \add to be\add* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to him, Though \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be not \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*, yet shall I be \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall be my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.  +  r 49.5  t Though…: or, That Israel may be gathered to him, and I may, etc *

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It is a light \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* that thou shouldest be my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and to \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* the \w preserved|strong="H5341"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: I will also \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee for a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, that thou mayest be my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* unto the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 49.6 \ft It is…: or, Art thou lighter than that thou shouldest, etc\f*\f + \fr 49.6 \ft preserved: or, desolations\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add and\add* his Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w*, to him whom \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H0960"\w*, to him whom the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w abhorreth|strong="H8581"\w*, to a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w*, \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* and \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* also shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*, because of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that is \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w*, \add and\add* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* thee.  +  r 49.7  t whom man…: or, that is despised in soul *

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, In an \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* have I \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* thee, and in a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* have I \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* thee: and I will \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* thee, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee for a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, to cause to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w heritages|strong="H5159"\w*;\f + \fr 49.8 \ft establish: or, raise up\f*

That thou mayest \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w prisoners|strong="H0631"\w*, Go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; to them that \add are\add* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w Shew|strong="H1540"\w* yourselves. They shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and their \w pastures|strong="H4830"\w* \add shall be\add* in all high \w places|strong="H8205"\w*.

They shall not \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w* nor \w thirst|strong="H6770"\w*; neither shall the \w heat|strong="H8273"\w* nor \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them: for he that hath \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on them shall \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* them, even by the \w springs|strong="H4002"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* shall he \w guide|strong="H5095"\w* them.
And I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* all my \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and my \w highways|strong="H4546"\w* shall be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

Behold, these shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*: and, lo, these from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* and from the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*; and these from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Sinim|strong="H5515"\w*.

¶ \w Sing|strong="H7442"\w*, O \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; and be \w joyful|strong="H1523"\w*, O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and break \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* into \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*, O \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and will have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon his \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*.

But \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me.

Can a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* her sucking \w child|strong="H5764"\w*, that she should not have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* on the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of her \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*? yea, they may \w forget|strong="H7911"\w*, yet will I not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thee.\f + \fr 49.15 \ft that…: Heb. from having compassion\f*
Behold, I have \w graven|strong="H2710"\w* thee upon the palms of \add my\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*; thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \add are\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* before me.

Thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*; thy \w destroyers|strong="H2040"\w* and they that made thee \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of thee.

¶ Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*: all these gather themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, \add and\add* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee. \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou shalt surely \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* thee with them all, as with an \w ornament|strong="H5716"\w*, and \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* them \add on thee\add*, as a \w bride|strong="H3618"\w* \add doeth\add*.

For thy \w waste|strong="H2723"\w* and thy desolate \w places|strong="H8074"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of thy \w destruction|strong="H2035"\w*, shall even now be too \w narrow|strong="H3334"\w* by reason of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*, and they that swallowed thee \w up|strong="H1104"\w* shall be far \w away|strong="H7368"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* which thou shalt have, after thou hast \w lost|strong="H7923"\w* the other, shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* again in thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, The \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add is\add* too \w strait|strong="H6862"\w* for me: \w give|strong="H5066"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to me that I may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*.

Then shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, Who hath \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* me these, seeing I have lost my \w children|strong="H7921"\w*, and am \w desolate|strong="H1565"\w*, a \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*, and removing to and \w fro|strong="H5493"\w*? and who hath brought \w up|strong="H1431"\w* these? Behold, I was \w left|strong="H7604"\w* alone; these, \w where|strong="H0375"\w* \add had\add* they \add been\add*?

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H7311"\w* my \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and they shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* in \add their\add* \w arms|strong="H2684"\w*, and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall be \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* upon \add their\add* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*.\f + \fr 49.22 \ft arms: Heb. bosom\f*

And \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall be thy nursing \w fathers|strong="H0539"\w*, and their \w queens|strong="H8282"\w* thy nursing \w mothers|strong="H3243"\w*: they shall bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* to thee with \add their\add* \w face|strong="H0639"\w* toward the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and lick \w up|strong="H3897"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for they shall not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for me.\f + \fr 49.23 \ft nursing fathers: Heb. nourishers\f*\f + \fr 49.23 \ft queens: Heb. princesses\f*

¶ Shall the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w* be \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* from the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, or the \w lawful|strong="H6662"\w* \w captive|strong="H7628"\w* \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*?\f + \fr 49.24 \ft lawful…: Heb. captivity of the just\f*

But thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Even the \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* shall be taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, and the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w* of the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* shall be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*: for I will \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* with him that \w contendeth|strong="H3401"\w* with thee, and I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 49.25 \ft captives: Heb. captivity\f*

And I will \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* them that \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* thee with their own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; and they shall be \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w* with their own \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, as with sweet \w wine|strong="H6071"\w*: and all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add am\add* thy \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w* and thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, the mighty \w One|strong="H0046"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 49.26 \ft sweet: or, new\f*
